reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app provides a data access, collection, use, and sharing disclosure within the app, fulfilling the requirement to declare the collection of data.
reply.reference: We provide a data access, collection, use, and sharing disclosure within the app. URL: https://genuisbraintraining.itify.net/policy.html

navigating away from the disclosure (such as tapping away or pressing the back or home buttons).

We don't publish or disclosure of people's non-public contacts.

don't sell personal and sensitive user data.

Privacy Policy
Last updated on 10.01.2023
This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which Genius Brain Training collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users (each, a "User") of the Genius Brain Training app. This privacy policy applies to the app and all products and services offered by Itify.
Personal Identification Information
We may collect personal identification information from Users in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, when Users access our app,...

information for the following purposes:
- To improve customer service: Information you provide helps us respond to your customer service requests and support needs more efficiently.
- To personalize user experience: We may use information in the aggregate to understand how our Users as a group use the services and resources provided on our app.
How We Protect Your Information
We adopt appropriate data collection, storage and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthori...

affiliates and advertisers for the purposes outlined above.We may use third party service providers to help us operate our business and the app or administer activities on our behalf, such as sending out newsletters or surveys. We may share your information with these third parties for those limited purposes provided that you have given us your permission.
How to Delete Data & Account?
You can delete your account and all related-date stored on our server. Please go to our app, login then go to S...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects non-personal identification information including the device’s name you used to connect to the app.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app may collect non-personal identification information, including the device's name. This information is collected whenever users interact with the app.
reply.reference: Non-personal Identification Information We may collect non-personal identification information about Users whenever they interact with our app. Non-personal identification information may include the device’s name you used to connect to our app, and other similar information. URL: https://genuisbraintraining.itify.net/policy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app provides a data access, collection, use, and sharing disclosure within the app, ensuring that users are informed about the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: A request for user consent and an associated runtime permission are both preceded and accompanied by our in-app disclosure. We do not access or collect any sensitive and personal information without the user's permission. Consent request from the app. URL: https://genuisbraintraining.itify.net/policy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: The user can delete their account and all related data stored on the server by going to the app, logging in, and selecting delete account. This request will be processed immediately, and all data related to the user will be wiped, making it impossible to recover.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the user has the option to delete their account and all related data stored on the server, ensuring control over their data.
reply.reference: You can delete your account and all related-date stored on our server. Please go to our app, login then go to Setting/Accoun/Select Delete Account. Your request will be processed immediately. Please note that we will wipe all data related to you so it's impossible to recovery. URL: https://genuisbraintraining.itify.net/policy.html

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Affiliates, advertisers, and third party service providers

extended_simple_answer.content: affiliates, advertisers, third party service providers

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing information with affiliates, advertisers, and third party service providers for specific purposes, provided user permission is granted.
reply.reference: We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates and advertisers for the purposes outlined above. We may use third party service providers to help us operate our business and the app or administer activities on our behalf, such as sending out newsletters or surveys. We may share your information with these third parties for those limited purposes provided that you have given us your permission. URL: https://genuisbraintraining.itify.net/policy.html
